item.title: CENTERPOINT ENERGY INC 10-K
item.description: CENTERPOINT ENERGY INC, which is in the Electric Services [4911] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 17, 2023 had 75960 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: energy - 1622 instances centerpoint - 1309 instances electric - 958 instances 1 - 924 instances 2022 - 721 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
